location.en: Embassy of the United States, Tehran

description.zh-cn: 1979年伊朗革命后，美国驻伊朗大使馆被占领，66名美国外交官和平民被扣为人质长达444天的危机。
description.en: A crisis following the 1979 Iranian Revolution where 66 American diplomats and civilians were held hostage for 444 days after the U.S. Embassy in Tehran was seized.

description.zh-cn: 导致伊朗巴列维王朝被推翻，并成立伊朗伊斯兰共和国的一系列事件。
description.en: A series of events that led to the overthrow of the Pahlavi dynasty in Iran and the establishment of the Islamic Republic of Iran.

en: Embassy of the United States, Tehran

description.zh-cn: 美国在伊朗的代表机构，在1979年的人质危机中被占领。
description.en: The diplomatic mission of the United States in Iran, which was seized during the 1979 hostage crisis.

description.zh-cn: 由阿尔及利亚作为中间人，美国和伊朗为解决人质危机而达成的一系列协议。
description.en: A set of agreements between the United States and Iran, mediated by Algeria, to resolve the Iran hostage crisis.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗政治家，伊朗人质危机爆发时任伊朗总理。
description.en: Iranian politician who was the Prime Minister of Iran at the time of the hostage crisis.

description.zh-cn: 由迈赫迪·巴扎尔甘领导的伊朗革命后首个政府，因人质危机而集体辞职。
description.en: The first government of Iran after the revolution, led by Mehdi Bazargan, which resigned en masse due to the hostage crisis.

nodes.id: 伊玛目穆斯林学生追随者阵线

zh-cn: 伊玛目穆斯林学生追随者阵线
en: Muslim Student Followers of the Imam's Line

description.zh-cn: 占领美国驻伊朗大使馆并扣押人质的伊朗学生组织。
description.en: The group of Iranian students who seized the U.S. Embassy in Tehran and held the hostages.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗伊斯兰革命的政治和精神领袖，伊朗伊斯兰共和国的创始人。
description.en: The political and spiritual leader of the Iranian Revolution and the founder of the Islamic Republic of Iran.

description.zh-cn: 美国第39任总统，伊朗人质危机发生在其任内。
description.en: The 39th President of the United States, during whose term the Iran hostage crisis occurred.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗巴列维王朝的末代国王，在1979年伊朗伊斯兰革命中被推翻。
description.en: The last Shah of the Pahlavi dynasty in Iran, overthrown in the 1979 Iranian Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 1951年当选的伊朗改革派首相，于1953年由美国和英国支持的政变中被推翻。
description.en: The reformist Prime Minister of Iran elected in 1951, who was overthrown in a 1953 coup backed by the United States and the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 1953年由美国中央情报局和英国军情六处策划，旨在推翻伊朗首相穆罕默德·莫沙德哈的政变。
description.en: A 1953 coup d'état planned by the CIA and MI6 to overthrow Iranian Prime Minister Mohammad Mosaddegh.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府的主要情报机构之一。
description.en: One of the principal intelligence agencies of the United States federal government.

description.zh-cn: 美国军方为营救在伊朗被扣押的人质而发起的一次失败的军事行动。
description.en: A failed United States Armed Forces operation to rescue the hostages held in Iran.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，在卡特政府担任国务卿，因反对鹰爪行动而辞职。
description.en: American politician who served as Secretary of State in the Carter administration and resigned in protest of Operation Eagle Claw.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗人质危机期间的加拿大丈夫，因协助六名美国外交官逃离伊朗而闻名。
description.en: The Canadian ambassador to Iran during the hostage crisis, known for helping six American diplomats escape from Iran.

description.zh-cn: 一部2012年的美国电影，改编自伊朗人质危机期间六名美国外交官在加拿大的帮助下逃离德黑兰的真实事件。
description.en: A 2012 American film based on the true story of six American diplomats who escaped from Tehran with Canadian help during the Iran hostage crisis.

description.zh-cn: 美国第40任总统，他在就职典礼后几分钟，伊朗人质被释放。
description.en: The 40th President of the United States, whose inauguration coincided with the release of the Iran hostages.

description.zh-cn: 一场在伊朗和伊拉克之间长达八年的武装冲突。
description.en: An eight-year armed conflict between Iran and Iraq.

nodes.id: 穆罕默德·礼萨·巴列维之死

zh-cn: 穆罕默德·礼萨·巴列维之死

description.zh-cn: 伊朗前国王穆罕默德·礼萨·巴列维在埃及开罗去世的事件。
description.en: The death of the former Shah of Iran, Mohammad Reza Pahlavi, in Cairo, Egypt.

nodes.id: 穆罕默德·穆萨维·霍伊尼哈

zh-cn: 穆罕默德·穆萨维·霍伊尼哈

description.zh-cn: 伊朗神职人员和政治家，被广泛认为是占领美国大使馆学生的精神导师。
description.en: Iranian cleric and politician, widely regarded as the spiritual mentor of the students who seized the US embassy.

nodes.id: 马哈茂德·艾哈迈迪内贾德

zh-cn: 马哈茂德·艾哈迈迪内贾德

description.zh-cn: 伊朗第六任总统，曾被部分人质指认参与了1979年的人质劫持行动。
description.en: The sixth president of Iran, who was accused by some former hostages of being involved in the 1979 hostage-taking.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗人质危机是伊朗伊斯兰革命的直接后果和延续。
description.en: The Iran hostage crisis was a direct consequence and continuation of the Iranian Revolution.

relationships.source: 伊玛目穆斯林学生追随者阵线

description.zh-cn: 伊玛目穆斯林学生追随者阵线组织并发动了占领美国大使馆的行动，直接引发了人质危机。
description.en: The Muslim Student Followers of the Imam's Line organized and launched the occupation of the U.S. Embassy, directly triggering the hostage crisis.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗人质危机导致伊朗与美国关系严重恶化，并在此后长期维持敌对状态。
description.en: The Iran hostage crisis led to a severe deterioration in relations between Iran and the United States, which have remained hostile for a long time since.

description.zh-cn: 由于人质危机事件，时任伊朗总理迈赫迪·巴扎尔甘及其内阁成员集体辞职。
description.en: Due to the hostage crisis, then-Prime Minister of Iran Mehdi Bazargan and his cabinet resigned en masse.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗人质危机导致由迈赫迪·巴扎尔甘领导的伊朗临时政府集体辞职。
description.en: The Iran hostage crisis led to the mass resignation of the Interim Government of Iran, led by Mehdi Bazargan.

description.zh-cn: 《阿尔及尔协议》的签署最终解决了人质危机，所有美国人质被释放。
description.en: The signing of the Algiers Accords ultimately resolved the hostage crisis, leading to the release of all American hostages.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗人质危机被普遍认为是导致吉米·卡特在1980年总统选举中竞选连任失败的主要原因。
description.en: The Iran hostage crisis is widely considered to be the primary reason for Jimmy Carter's failure to win re-election in the 1980 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 在被推翻前的数十年间，美国一直是伊朗国王穆罕默德·礼萨·巴列维的主要支持者，为其提供了大量军事和经济援助。
description.en: For decades before he was overthrown, the United States was the main supporter of Shah Mohammad Reza Pahlavi of Iran, providing him with extensive military and economic aid.

description.zh-cn: 在1953年的阿贾克斯行动中，伊朗首相穆罕默德·莫沙德哈被政变推翻。
description.en: In the 1953 Operation Ajax, Iranian Prime Minister Mohammad Mosaddegh was overthrown by a coup d'état.

description.zh-cn: 美国中央情报局帮助巴列维国王发动了旨在推翻莫沙德哈的阿贾克斯行动。
description.en: The U.S. Central Intelligence Agency assisted Shah Pahlavi in launching Operation Ajax to overthrow Mosaddegh.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗伊斯兰革命推翻了穆罕默德·礼萨·巴列维的统治，迫使其流亡国外。
description.en: The Iranian Revolution overthrew the rule of Mohammad Reza Pahlavi, forcing him into exile.

relationships.target: 伊玛目穆斯林学生追随者阵线

description.zh-cn: 霍梅尼的反美言论及号召激励了占领大使馆的学生，这些学生自称为“伊玛目的门徒”。
description.en: Khomeini's anti-American rhetoric and calls inspired the students who occupied the embassy, who called themselves 'Muslim Student Followers of the Imam's Line'.

description.zh-cn: 时任美国总统吉米·卡特批准了旨在营救人质的“鹰爪行动”。
description.en: Then-U.S. President Jimmy Carter approved Operation Eagle Claw, which aimed to rescue the hostages.

description.zh-cn: 鹰爪行动因飞机相撞坠毁而失败，并导致8名美国军人阵亡。
description.en: Operation Eagle Claw failed due to a helicopter and transport plane collision, resulting in the deaths of eight U.S. servicemen.

description.zh-cn: 时任美国国务卿赛勒斯·万斯因反对鹰爪行动而辞职。
description.en: Then-U.S. Secretary of State Cyrus Vance resigned in protest of Operation Eagle Claw.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大政府及其驻伊朗大使肯·泰勒为六名逃脱的美国外交官提供了庇护和虚假护照，帮助他们安全离开伊朗。
description.en: The Canadian government and its ambassador to Iran, Ken Taylor, provided shelter and false passports for six escaped American diplomats, helping them to leave Iran safely.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典驻伊朗大使馆为六名逃脱的美国外交官提供了庇护。
description.en: The Swedish Embassy in Tehran provided shelter for six escaped American diplomats.

description.zh-cn: 2012年的电影《逃离德黑兰》改编自伊朗人质危机期间六名美国人质在加拿大的帮助下成功逃脱的事件。
description.en: The 2012 film 'Argo' is based on the event during the Iran hostage crisis where six American hostages successfully escaped with Canadian help.

description.zh-cn: 罗纳德·雷根在1980年美国总统选举中击败了寻求连任的吉米·卡特。
description.en: Ronald Reagan defeated the incumbent Jimmy Carter in the 1980 United States presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 两伊战争的爆发使得伊朗方面变得更希望能够解决人质危机。
description.en: The outbreak of the Iran-Iraq War made Iran more eager to resolve the hostage crisis.

relationships.source: 穆罕默德·礼萨·巴列维之死

description.zh-cn: 前伊朗国王巴列维的去世，是促使伊朗方面更希望解决人质危机的因素之一。
description.en: The death of former Iranian Shah Pahlavi was one of the factors that made Iran more eager to resolve the hostage crisis.

description.zh-cn: 阿尔及利亚作为中间人，帮助美国与伊朗就人质危机进行谈判。
description.en: Algeria acted as an intermediary, helping the United States and Iran negotiate over the hostage crisis.

relationships.source: 穆罕默德·穆萨维·霍伊尼哈
relationships.target: 伊玛目穆斯林学生追随者阵线

description.zh-cn: 作为占领美国大使馆学生的精神领袖，穆罕默德·穆萨维·霍伊尼哈对他们的行动起到了推动作用。
description.en: As the spiritual leader of the students who seized the US embassy, Mohammad Mousavi Khoeiniha played a role in pushing their actions forward.

relationships.source: 马哈茂德·艾哈迈迪内贾德

description.zh-cn: 根据部分前人质的指认，马哈茂德·艾哈迈迪内贾德曾参与人质劫持行动，但伊朗政府对此予以否认。
description.en: According to some former hostages, Mahmoud Ahmadinejad participated in the hostage-taking, but the Iranian government denies this.
